scripts.dev: concurrently 'cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--inspect" next dev' 'prettier "../**/*" --write --no-editorconfig --config ".prettierrc" --ignore-unknown --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern --log-level silent --check || true' 'chokidar "../**/*" --silent --command "prettier \"{path}\" --write --no-editorconfig --config \".prettierrc\" --ignore-unknown --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern"' 'sass --watch --quiet src/static/scss/:src/static/css/'
scripts.tev: concurrently 'cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--inspect" IS_TURBO=true next dev --turbo' 'prettier "../**/*" --write --no-editorconfig --config ".prettierrc" --ignore-unknown --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern --log-level silent --check || true' 'chokidar "../**/*" --silent --command "prettier \"{path}\" --write --no-editorconfig --config \".prettierrc\" --ignore-unknown --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern"' 'sass --watch --quiet src/static/scss/:src/static/css/'
